name.ja: <ruby>月光金獅子<rt>ムーライト・ゴールド・レオ</rt></ruby>

text.en: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Lunalight" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Lunalight Gold Leo", then discard 1 card. If a "Lunalight" monster(s) is sent to your GY while this card is in the Monster Zone, even during the Damage Step: You can target 1 of them; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Lunalight Gold Leo" once per turn.
